meanings.definition: A professional female dancer in India.
meanings.sent1: The talented bayadeers performed a graceful dance routine.
meanings.sent2: In India, bayadeers are highly respected for their dancing skills.
meanings.sent3: The bayadeers added a touch of elegance to the event with their beautiful performance.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as mesmerizing as a group of bayadeers in full swing.
meanings.sent5: The audience was captivated by the bayadeers' enchanting performance.

meanings.definition: A group of female dancers in India.
meanings.sent1: The colorful costumes of the bayadeers caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: During the festival, a troupe of bayadeers entertained the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The bayadeers danced in perfect harmony, creating a delightful spectacle.
meanings.sent4: The bayadeers moved like a flock of graceful birds on stage.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic beats accompanied the bayadeers' synchronized movements.
